评论详情: I recently purchased a few Dokotoo Women's Blouses and Tops, including their Short Sleeve Chiffon Shirts and Tops, and I'm absolutely thrilled with my experience. The quality of the chiffon fabric is exceptional. It's lightweight, breathable, and drapes beautifully, perfect for warm weather or layering under a blazer for a more polished look. I love how the fabric doesn't wrinkle easily, which is a huge plus for busy days when I need to look put together without a lot of fuss. Fit-wise, the sizing is accurate, and the tops are tailored in a flattering way without being too tight or restrictive. The short sleeves are just the right length, and the overall cut is feminine without being overly girly.  Overall, I highly recommend this top for anyone looking to add versatile, stylish pieces to their wardrobe. Whether dressing for work, a casual outing, or a special occasion, this line has something that will make you look and feel fabulous.

评论概述: 🌸 Stylish & Comfy – Dokotoo Women's Chiffon Blouses & Tops! 👚
评论详情: The Dokotoo Women's Chiffon Blouses and Tops are an absolute must-have for any wardrobe! 😍 These tops strike the perfect balance between style and comfort, making them perfect for both casual and semi-formal occasions. The lightweight chiffon fabric is breathable and soft, keeping you cool and comfortable all day long—whether you're at the office, out with friends, or running errands. 🏃‍♀️💨 The short sleeves add a relaxed, airy vibe, while the flowy fit provides a flattering silhouette that works with any body type. 🌿✨

I ordered the blue one and it was very pretty and a flattering fit. I will say the style may not compliment every body type so don't go by height/weight of others. If you have a wide waist you may find it snug. The length just about sits at the waist so you can't pull it down if you wanted more coverage for your lower half. On the flip side if you are on the small chested skinny side you may not like how it hangs because your body type alters the look of the style. It will wrinkle so wash on delicate with Woolite and always hang.

评论概述: Beautiful cut and fit but fabric isn't the best quality
评论详情: I love everything about this except I wish the fabric was a bit higher quality, I am 5'4", 135 lbs and the M fits perfectly. The draped neckline is beautiful and very flattering. I've worn this with jeans and with nice wide leg pants and it goes well with both being able to be dressed up and down equally well. I only wish the fabric was a little higher quality. It's a bit hard to describe, but the crepe chiffon fabric that this is made of, is very inexpensive quality. It's the same kind of chiffon that tops at Walmart and other low-end stores would carry. On the one hand, the price of this top makes this understandable. On the other hand, I'd have happily paid a little more for a more tightly woven crepe chiffon. I ordered this in black, so the difference isn't as apparent as it probably would be in other colors. If ordering this in black, you can get away with it - - - especially if wearing it at night in dimmer lighting. When I wore this with jeans during the day, I was bothered by it more because the natural lighting really called attention to the cheaper fabric quality. When I wore this to dinner with my wide leg pants, it was barely noticeable - - - and probably by only me because I was aware of it. If you are ordering this in other colors and thinking of wearing it in a professional office setting workplace, I'd think twice.

I was looking for several tops that could be worn casually or dressed for work. This can be worn with straight skirts or jeans. I bought large. I’m 5-7 165 36DD AND sIZE 12 bottom. For a very flowy look like the model go a size up. The fabric does not stretch. The bottom hem is a tad snug over jeans . Will be buying more colors but in xl. Stitching looks good and should hold up.
Great price and super versatile. I’ve worn it with jeans or a skirt and it’s super flowy and feminine any way you wear it. True to size and washed well. Might buy a few more!
Sizing was too big, poor quality as item was see through. Would not recommend. Nice color of blue though.
I wore this blouse for Thanksgiving and got so many compliments. The only down fall was it kept falling off shoulder. I probably could have got a smaller size.
As a narrow shouldered gal, it fit me sort of oddly. I probably should have returned it.

评论概述: I now own this in 4 colors
评论详情: This is hands down one of my favorite shirts. I originally bought it in a light blue but have since added pink, green, and black to my wardrobe. Every time I wear it, I get numerous compliments. It feels nice and soft, and the looseness makes it great for warmer weather (no sweat marks!) I've also traveled with the blue one several times, and it comes out of the suitcase with minimal enough wrinkling that I don't have to iron it. Love that!
Ill probably buy this in another color or 2. Super cute & stylish!
Runs big

Needed a stylish and pretty blouse in a beautiful spring hue for a family business event. Found this one and was intrigued, so I ordered it in three different colors. It is a gorgeous blouse - very well-made and nice fabric (not see through!)... the only reason it did not receive a perfect five stars is because the seaming in front of the shoulders is a bit odd. But, overall, the colors are gorgeous (the light blue and hot pink are STUNNERS!) and it wears beautifully. It does require a clothes steamer (which I purchased at Wally World for a mere $9.00). Once steamed, it stays wrinkle-free, even after wearing! Plan to order several more in other colors. Highly recommend. Wore with a pretty moto jacket unzipped and the collar laid perfectly at the jacket opening.
I am very happy with this blouse. Although it runs large. The fabric looks very high-quality.

评论概述: Color is little different than what was shown and is brighter and pinkier
评论详情: I love the shape and form of this top - its overall style. I now have two of these - one off white and one this rosy pinky one. Fit is good and as expected. I followed the size chart they gave. If it helps my measurements are: 5'2" and 36 x D3 chest and this top fit well when I am fluctuating 140-150 lbs. I bought a Medium. I seldom find this sort of information on here and find it very useful so hopefully someone else will too! It hides whatever I want it to hide 🙈 and being a curvy person myself I'd say it works for curvy people. Its very flattering, not at all sheer, and machine washable (it did not shrink for me!) Just took off the one star as the color if little different than what was shown and is brighter and pinkier and I was expecting to be more fader/duller as shown in the picture
Not exactly like the pic.. the top folds over in the front but I did still like it.  It was comfy and looked really nice with jeans .  I would not put in the dryer.  But over all liked it
I really like the color it was perfect and the material was nice and lightweight. But the sleeves were too "flowy" somehow for me and didn't drape right.
The fit was not what I expected. To big on the top and too tight thru the waist.
It’s a super cute shirt and it looks good with jeans or slacks. Took off a star because the material is not what I expected. A couple of washes and I’m not sure how it’s going to look.
This is a very comfortable, femine shirt.  I got it in purple and the color is beautiful.  The material also feels very good on your skin.
I struggle with the tops like this in the front they can lay strange. The color is beautiful! The material feels like it is probably from Shein and would have been a lot cheaper on there.
Love the blouse but runs small, I wear a 10 or medium, order a large and is small :)

评论概述: Nice, dressy shirt that fits well
评论详情: The fabric was good quality. It seemed to fit closely but not so loose that I had to adjust it constantly. Looked as good as the picture on.  Would definitely buy again in a different color
The white was very see through and baggier than expected. It arrived very wrinkled and this material wrinkles easily and shows all the wrinkles.  Fabric quality was disappointing.
Nice material and cute

For reference, size L. I'm 5'7" and currently at & below the 180 lb mark. I'm halfway to my goal😁 Not easy to do in your late 60s... OMAD😐 Hopefully the shirt will still look good down 25lbs or so from now. This shirt is such a beautiful color! There were, of course, 1 or 2 wrinkles when I took it out of the bag. A couple sprays of water and some light touch ups with the iron fixed that, though I didn't really have to. Maybe just spray with water and let the breeze blow it out. It seems that not many people own irons these days. It fits well. The bottom anchors to the hip area and the drape hides a myriad of secrets😘 Very feminine! If you bend forward in front of someone, you might want to bring up your hand to your face/neck area to block the view, though there's a 50 50 chance the material will drape to the side and take care of it. The material is 95% polyester, 5% spandex. Instructions say Machine wash, "do not tumble dry". I'll take my chances with low setting. The fabric is thick enough to not be translucent and thin enough to drape well. I'm thinking of ordering in more colors.

I am 5’3”, weigh 180 and top heavy. Menopausal mom, holding my weight in my upper body and stomach area. I ordered a large, and I am glad I did. I almost always opt for the XL regardless of reviews because I do not like any type of restriction. The xl here may have been too boxy around mid section. I love this shirt. It drapes nicely to hid my stomach yet doesn’t look frumpy. Tall girls, this will be short on you! I am 5’3” and it sits right at my Jean pockets on high waist. The neck drapes nicely and it can be dressed up or down. I ironed it out of package and haven’t washed it yet, so not sure if it’ll need ironing every time. Hope this helps. I see SO many reviews where people do not put what size they bought or what size THEY are, which makes the review fairly useless, so I included it all.

评论概述: Great dress up or down shirt
评论详情: This shirt has versatility for work or play. The fit is true to size and the color a true white. The white is a little sheer so you need to remember with your choice of bra. It does wrinkle easy throughout the day so I caution if you are traveling or sitting for long periods, it will wrinkle. It was a good value and enough to purchase multiple colors.
This is a very classy top. I purchased it in several different colors. Looks great alone or with a jacket.
I got this shirt for work, not thinking much of it but it’s so cute, great value for what it cost and the thickness of the material was great
Shirt is cute but not True to size, you need to size down.  I typically wear a small but this shirt was HUGE and blousy on me.
Beautiful blouse the blue is just gorgeous for the fall! Fits great and is very comfortable

I’m 5’2” and have a number of shirts similar to this look and material. I thought the cut and how it hung looked cute in the photos, but it is just not the case. It is very messy and doesn’t look like a nice shirt. Maybe it works for taller women, it just didn’t work for me.
It had a more cropped fit than was pictured. I definitely recommend sizing up if you want a flowy fit.

At first, I hesitated at this shirt because I wasn't sure how it would fit/lay with the unique design.  But it looks great and is a breezy dressy option for a summer/spring event.  It is not too sheer, so you see through it but is breathable material and very comfortable.

评论详情: Loved this top when I tried it on. It is perfect for work- looks very professional l. Unfortunately, the material is thin so the shirt was see through.

评论概述: beautiful color, fit is perfect, hides that little extra around the mid section
评论详情: Love the color of the shirt, the fit is amazing for anyone who has a little extra fluff around the middle and wants to cover it up.  So far has held up to wash and wear, just have to remove it from the dryer when done and hang it up (no ironing needed).  Very comfortable to wear and gives the right touch of professionalism when paired with slacks for a work day.
Blouse is way larger than advertised.
This shirt is much better quality than I expected. It's incredibly flattering and washes really well. I'm planning to buy it in more colors!
I love the style and fit. My only negative is that you can see through the top. It is more sheer than the picture shows.

I needed a nice blouse for work and meetings. This fits amazing and is very flattering, I even ordered another color! I bought a size S in this, so did with the green color as well- however, the green one fit a bit differently and kept falling down so I returned it. I do recommend this shirt still!
Beautiful color for summer,  lots of compliments everytime I wear this shirt!
Love the material, it’s very comfortable and flattering.

An effortless look.  Camouflages the tummy with gentle folds of fabric.  Unfortunately, both the tops I purchased have started to pill across the lower front where they hit the kitchen counter. The fit of this blouse is perfect! the color is a little more peachy than light pink but I can work with that. Highly recommend.
Fit well for size ordered.  Quick shipping and well designed
I like that it’s a bit different than every other shirt out there.  I had to return it tho because there was some type of stain / puncture in the one I received.  I may reorder.

I'm 5'6" and chubby so I was pleased the style of this top was flattering and didn't hug too tightly around the belly. It was shorter than expected, but I have a long torso so that's typical for tops. The celadon green was much more of a bright mint color (cool more than warm). The fabric was also very thin which would be great for summer but makes it feel cheap. I'm planning to return because of the fabric and the color wasn't as expected.

This top is flattering if you have a bit of a tummy you’re trying to hide. Be aware… it is a bit high maintenance.  I got an XL and I’m 5’8,195lb. It’s long enough for me, which was great. The front of the shirt isn’t sewed to itself, which is what creates the flowy, draped look. Because of that the front fabric flaps out when you put it on and you’ll have to tuck it back down.  I also used 3 pieces of dress tape to secure it: one piece on each bra strap to hold it and one piece to hold the v shaped neck line together. If you had a seated job, this may not be necessary but I teach elementary school and move around a lot, so I didn’t want it shifting. I liked it enough to keep it.

I now have four of these white, beige, teal, and black. I can dress them up or down, they cover my flabby arms, and I love the neckline. I am 5 foot four and a 38D and the medium fits perfectly.
